titleStmt.title: Ein Sermon von Ablass und Gnade: a digital edition

publicationStmt.publisher: Taylor Institution Library, one of the Bodleian Libraries of the University of Oxford,

availability.licence: XML files are available for download under a Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International License .
Images are available for download under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-NoDerivatives 4.0 International License .

note.p: This is a facsimile and transcription of Eyn Sermon von dem Ablass vnnd Gnade. Luther, Martin, and Valentin Schumann | Leipzig: [Valentin Schumann], 1518. It is held by the Taylor Institution Library (shelf mark: ARCH.8o.G.1518(6)). Verzeichnis der im deutschen Sprachbereich erschienenen Drucke des 16. Jahrhunderts (VD 16) reference number: L6270.
The transcription was created by Christiane Rehagen, and encoded in TEI P5 xml by librarian Emma Huber.
The footnotes were created by Howard Jones. Some references are to the printed book.

titleStmt.title: Eyn Sermon Von Dem Ablass Vnnd Gnade.
titleStmt.author: Luther, Martin, 1483-1546; Schumann, Valentin

bibl.note: with an English translation by Howard Jones.

change.label: completed volume-level markup, give text element a xml:id and xml:lang
